Now that the upgrade problems have been located, perform this to display results in the Project Explorer > Liferay Upgrade Problems node. Then as you select each upgrade problem, the documentation for how to adapt your code will be disabled in the Liferay Upgrade Plan Info VIew

For each upgrade problem node, you can mark them as resolved/skipped using the context menu. Leave this step marked as INCOMPLETE until after you have resolved all upgrade problems accordingly.
